name: Advent Grog
description: Grog was originally used to help prevent scurvy in British sailors, but with scurvy no longer a problem, it's worth keeping this version around for the easy-drinking citrus and cinnamon flavor.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces boiling water, plus extra for warming mugs
3/4 ounce fresh lime juice from 1 lime

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat mug by filling it with warm water for 1 minute. Dump out water when ready to fill mug.
Add both types of rum, lime juice, demerara syrup, cinnamon stick, and 2 ounces boiling water to mug. Garnish with lime wheel and serve.
